_header: Of all matters I have say[ ]yns
Subjects: envoys; chronicles, verse in; patronage, pleas for
_description: Verses appended to Hardyng’s Chronicle as envoy to royal patron — ten stanzas rhyme royal

HarEng1054.First Lines:
Off alle maters I haue say[ ]yns How as I coude espy and in al [
                    maner? ] wiseWhich if it may your highnes wel con[t]ent…
HarEng1054.Last Lines:
…And want of golde was los within a yereThat we had goot
                    þi[ ]ten as doth apere
HarEng1054.Note: Written by same fifteenth-century hand as Chronicle.
